author: danielsh
msg: Add some notes on the syntax of the repository root relative url support in
the svn command-line client.  Also include known issues with some shells'
(Tweaked by me to add examples and reserve '^' URLs.)

author: hwright
msg: Fix pool issue which definitely can lead to assertion failures in
reintegrate, and quite possibly to other mergeinfo corruption.

author: hwright
msg: Notes: 'log -g' fails the moment it encounters a bogus mergeinfo which
claims a merge from a non-existentpath@REV1-REV2.

author: hwright
msg: Add optional pool parameter to the Editor methods missing it, matching
the rest (not to mention the C API!).
